query.q: eval(A, alias='Memory High Water Mark %', A="M::`aerospike`:(AVG(`namespace_high_water_memory_pct`)) { `cluster_name` = '#{cluster_name}' and `ns` = '#{namespace}' }")

eval(A+B+C+D, alias='Total', A="RATE(\"M::`aerospike`:(AVG(`namespace_client_read_success`) AS `Successful`) { `cluster_name` = '#{cluster_name}' and `ns` = '#{namespace}' }\").WINDOW('1m')", B="RATE(\"M::`aerospike`:(AVG(`namespace_client_read_error`) AS `Error`) { `cluster_name` = '#{cluster_name}' and `ns` = '#{namespace}' }\").WINDOW('1m')", C="RATE(\"M::`aerospike`:(AVG(`namespace_client_read_timeout`) AS `Timeout`) { `cluster_name` = '#{cluster_name}' and `ns` = '#{namespace}' } \").WINDOW('1m')", D="RATE(\"M::`aerospike`:(AVG(`namespace_client_read_not_found`) AS `Not Found`) { `cluster_name` = '#{cluster_name}' and `ns` = '#{namespace}' }\").WINDOW('1m')")

eval(A+B+C, alias='Total', A="RATE(\"M::`aerospike`:(AVG(`namespace_client_write_success`) AS `Successful`) { `cluster_name` = '#{cluster_name}' and `ns` = '#{namespace}' }\").WINDOW('1m')", B="RATE(\"M::`aerospike`:(AVG(`namespace_client_write_error`) AS `Error`) { `cluster_name` = '#{cluster_name}' and `ns` = '#{namespace}' }\").WINDOW('1m')", C="RATE(\"M::`aerospike`:(AVG(`namespace_client_write_timeout`) AS `Timeout`) { `cluster_name` = '#{cluster_name}' and `ns` = '#{namespace}' } \").WINDOW('1m')")

title: Aerospike Namespace Overview 监控视图
